overview: Toby (Jack Bailey) is staying at his 'Uncle' Carl's apartment after a concert. As Toby's dad's best friend, Carl (Dale Savage) has always been in his life and has seen him grow up. He trusts Carl, and is looking forward to spending quality time with him. Carl is anticipating Toby's sleeover as well, but for a different reason. Now that Toby's eighteen, Carl's intentions toward the younger man are less pure. He sees the man Toby's became and wants to get closer to him, so he'll do what it takes to make sure that happens.
title: A Virgin No More
